snippet: Andy Murray knew nine-times French Open champion Rafael Nadal was struggling with a wrist injury when he practised with the Spaniard during the build-up to Roland Garros....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray knew nine-times French Open champion Rafael Nadal was struggling with a wrist injury when he practised with the Spaniard during the build-up to Roland Garros.

headline.print_headline: Murray Aware of Nadal Injury During Practice
headline.main: Murray Aware of Nadal Injury During Practice
